de.mpg.aai.shhaa.authz
Class LogicRule

java.lang.Object
  de.mpg.aai.shhaa.authz.LogicRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
public class LogicRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule

implementation of Rule, represents a logic rule, as defined in the config file, see Location;

syntax: <rule logic="AND|OR">

the attribute 'logic' specifies the behavior of how this rule's child rules (childRules are interpreted during evaluate(AuthAttributes):
  • AND - all (child)rules need to match (themselves evaluate to true) to evaluate (this) to true
  • OR - evaluate true as soon one (child)rule evaluates true

    • Author:
    megger
